title: Syllabus mentioned in ERP
text: Global Entrepreneurship labs â Emerging Markets (EP 60028) Market review of emerging markets, Economics of growth, the major entrepreneurship labs/centers of the world, International marketing and business development, Networking of entrepreneurs based on culture and type of businesses, simultaneous access of venture resources, innovations and technical talent for accelerated ripening of growth ventures
